text: The Taylor Cub was originally designed by C. Gilbert Taylor as a small, light and simple aircraft, evolved from the Arrowing Chummy. It is the forefather of the popular Piper J-3 Cub, and total production of the Cub series was 23,512 aircraft. It has a Continental A-40 engine. == Variants == ; Taylor E-2 ; Taylor E-2 Cub ; Category:American aircraft
title: Taylor E-2 Cub
